activation.ReallyYourEmail: Wannan shine ainihin adireshin imel ɗin ku, {{1}}? Idan haka ne, danna nan don saita kalmar wucewar ku kuma kunna asusunku.

LinkToUnsubscribe: Anan akwai hanyar haɗin yanar gizo don cire rajista idan ba kwa son samun ƙarin imel.

charge.HasBeenCharged: Hey, wannan kawai don sanar da ku an caje {1000} akan {{3}} ta {{4}}

charged.HavePaid: Sannu {{1}}, wannan shine kawai tabbatarwa da sauri cewa kun sami nasarar biya {1000} zuwa {1001}} akan {{4}}

resend.YouAreReceiving: Kuna karɓar wannan imel ɗin saboda wani ya shigar da adireshin imel ɗin ku ya danna "manta kalmar wucewa". Idan ba kai ba, kawai ka watsar da wannan sakon.
resend.Reset: Don sake saita kalmar wucewar ku, danna {{1}}

subscription.YouHaveStarted: Hey {{1}}, kun fara biyan kuɗin ku zuwa {1000} da {1001}} a {{4}} har tsawon watanni {{5}}.
subscription.HasStarted: Wannan shine kawai don sanar da ku {{1}}, sun fara biyan kuɗin su zuwa {1000}} tare da {1001}} a {{4}} har tsawon watanni {{5}}.
